code:
---
config:
  logLevel: 'debug'
  theme: 'base'
---
gitGraph
    %% Step 1: Initial state: main branch with v1.0.0 tag
    commit id: "1.0.0" tag: "v1.0.0"

    %% Step 2: Create release/1 from main for next release preparation
    branch release/1 order: 2
    checkout release/1
    commit id: "1.0.1-rc.1.post.1"
    commit id: "1.0.1-rc.1.post.2"

    %% Step 3: Create release/2 from the second commit of release/1 (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    %% release/1 at this point: 1.0.1-rc.1.post.2, so release/2 continues from there
    checkout release/1
    branch release/2 order: 1
    checkout release/2
    commit id: "1.0.1-rc.2.post.3"

    %% Step 4: Go back to release/1 and add the problematic third commit (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    checkout release/1
    commit id: "1.0.1-rc.1.post.3" tag: "issues found"

    %% Step 5: release/2 completes preparation successfully
    checkout release/2
    commit id: "1.0.1-rc.2.post.4"

    %% Step 6: Merge release/2 to main and release v1.1.0
    checkout main
    merge release/2 id: "1.1.0" tag: "v1.1.0"
repo_description: Automatic versioning for every commit - Generate semantic versions from any commit across all branches, or dirty working directory, with seamless pre-release handling and flexible format support for a

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Generic Diagram应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Generic Diagram的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Generic Diagram结束。
